(UNITURN mérőállomás alsó szerelőlap)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_usb_tavtarto.txt -t)
(plot cmd: -i uniturn_usb_tavtarto.txt -t -p)

(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d1.5 h19
yxz
t1
s50
f300

c1 = 0.2
c2 = 0.1
c3 = 0.1
z1 = 2.2

j1 = 0.05

(bigyó_1)
b inline 5.25,0 size2,6 z$z1 c$c1 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1
b inline 5.25,8 size2,6 z$z1 c$c1 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1
b inline 17.75,0 size2,6 z$z1 c$c1 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1
b inline 17.75,8 size2,6 z$z1 c$c1 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1
b inline 7.5,5.75 size10,2 z$z1 c$c3 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1

(horony)
l 0,13.75 25,13.75 z1.2 c$c2
l 0,14.05 25,14.05 z1.2 c$c2

(körvonal)
b outline 0,0 size25,24 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,0.7 nl1,1,0,1

(bigyó_2)
b inline 31.75,0 size2,6 z$z1 c$c1 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1
b inline 31.75,8 size2,6 z$z1 c$c1 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1
b inline 44.25,0 size2,6 z$z1 c$c1 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1
b inline 44.25,8 size2,6 z$z1 c$c1 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1
b inline 34,5.75 size10,2 z$z1 c$c3 g0,0.1,0.7 jg$j1

(horony)
l 26.5,21.2 51.5,21.2 z1.2 c$c2
l 26.5,21.5 51.5,21.5 z1.2 c$c2

(körvonal2)
b outline 26.5,0 size25,24 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,0.7

(merevito_1)
b outline 0,25.5 size43.8,11 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,0.7 nl1,0,1,0
b inline -.5,28.5 size4,5 c$c1 z$z1 nl0,1,1,1
b inline 40.3,28.5 size4,5 c$c1 z$z1 nl1,1,0,1
#l 17.4,30.5 26.4,30.5 z$z1 c$c3
b inline 16.9,29.5 size10,2 c.05 z$z1 jg$j1

(merevito_2)
b outline 0,38 size43.8,11 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,0.7 nl1,1,1,1
b inline -.5,41 size4,5 c$c1  z$z1 nl0,1,1,1
b inline 40.3,41 size4,5 c$c1 z$z1 nl1,1,0,1
#l 17.4,42.5 26.4,42.5 z$z1 c$c3
b inline 16.9,42.25 size10,2 c$c3 z$z1 jg$j1

(merevito_3)
b outline 0,50.5 size43.8,15 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,0.7 nl1,1,1,0
b inline -.5,50 size17.4,3 z$z1 c$c1 nl0,1,1,0
b inline 26.9,50 size17.4,3 z$z1 c$c1 nl1,1,0,0
b inline -.5,63 size17.4,3 z$z1 c.0.3 nl0,0,1,1
b inline 26.9,63 size17.4,3 z$z1 c$c1 nl1,0,0,1
h 21.9,58 d4 z$z1 c$c1
